item.title: Characterising non-stationarity in predictive models of land use in Swiss mountain parks to inform scenarios for deliberative transformation.
item.dc:creator: Ben Black, Sergio Wicki, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey
item.description:
These are the slides for a presentation I gave on quantifying non-stationarity in predictive models of land use change at the International Mountain Conference in Innsbruck 2022. The abstract is available here.

Citation

BibTeX citation:
@online{black,sergiowicki,adriennegrêt-regamey2022,
  author = {Ben Black, Sergio Wicki, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey},
  title = {Characterising Non-Stationarity in Predictive Models of Land
    Use in {Swiss} Mountain Parks to Inform Scenarios for Deliberative
    Transformation.},
  date = {2022-09-13},
  url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.13140/RG.2.2.26822.55367},
  langid = {en}
}
For attribution, please cite this work as:
Ben Black, Sergio Wicki, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey. 2022. “Characterising Non-Stationarity in Predictive Models of Land Use in Swiss Mountain Parks to Inform Scenarios for Deliberative Transformation.” September 13, 2022. http://dx.doi.org/10.13140/RG.2.2.26822.55367.

item.title: ValPar.CH: Integrating land use change, Ecosystem Service and Biodiversity modelling to simulate pathways for a functioning Ecological Infrastructure for Switzerland.
item.dc:creator: Ben Black, Antoine Adde, Nathan Külling, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey, Antoine Guisan, Anthony Lehmann
item.description:
These are the slides for a presentation I gave on the integration of different modelling approaches within the ValPar.CH project at the 11th International Environmental Modelling and Software Society (IEMSs) 2022 conference. The abstract is available here.

Citation

BibTeX citation:

  title = {ValPar.CH: {Integrating} Land Use Change, {Ecosystem}

  date = {2022-07-02},
  url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.13140/RG.2.2.20111.66720},

item.title: Combining filter and embedded approaches to improve variable selection in land use change Cellular Automata models
item.dc:creator: Ben Black
item.description:
These are the slides for a presentation I gave on the application of feature selection as part of calibration of land use change cellular automata at the11th International Environmental Modelling and Software Society (IEMSs) 2022 conference. The presentation abstract is available on here.

Citation

BibTeX citation:
@online{black2022,
  author = {Ben Black},
  title = {Combining Filter and Embedded Approaches to Improve Variable
    Selection in Land Use Change {Cellular} {Automata} Models},
  date = {2022-07-01},
  url = {https://blenback.github.io/presentations/2022_07_01_IEMSs_model_pres},
  langid = {en}
}
For attribution, please cite this work as:
Ben Black. 2022. “Combining Filter and Embedded Approaches to Improve Variable Selection in Land Use Change Cellular Automata Models.” July 1, 2022. https://blenback.github.io/presentations/2022_07_01_IEMSs_model_pres.

item.title: Ex-ante identification of policy interventions to secure a functioning ecological infrastructure: A participatory Bayesian Network approach in Switzerland
item.dc:creator: Ben Black, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey
item.description:
These are the slides for a presentation I gave on the integration of different modelling approaches within the ValPar.CH project at the 3rd Ecosystem Services Partnership (ESP) Europe Regional conference in Tartu, Estonia 2021. The abstract is available here.

Citation

BibTeX citation:
@online{black,adriennegrêt-regamey2021,
  author = {Ben Black, Adrienne Grêt-Regamey},
  title = {Ex-Ante Identification of Policy Interventions to Secure a
    Functioning Ecological Infrastructure: {A} Participatory {Bayesian}
    {Network} Approach in {Switzerland}},
  date = {2021-06-09},
  url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.13140/RG.2.2.30177.99686},
  langid = {en}
}
For attribution, please cite this work as:
